revision.text: Possibly: Devotion reviv′d : or, safe and easie directions for a truly religious life. With a character of the principal vertues necessary for a Christian. By a divine of the Church of England. (London : Printed for R. Smith, at Bishop Beveridge's Head, in Pater-Noster-Row, 1716.) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/731620944
